p: We also present summary results at subnational levels. We use the National Climate Assessment regions ( Figure 1) to present population and heat-mortality results. Several of the regions are expected to experience substantial population growth ( Figure 2). For example, the population in the Southeast is projected to increase, from 79 m people in 2010 to 116 m in 2090 for the SSP2 scenario and to over 169 m for the SSP5 scenario.
